backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with resident-related types and comparison helpers, integrating authorization and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration that auto-archives discharged residents older than 30 days while preserving all other data.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records linking dashboard discharge/delete actions and admin checks to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of key frontend files, including pages, dialogs, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment and smokeâ€‘test checklist for Version 89 with no code changes allowed.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables and styles for light/dark modes and layout behavior.
frontend/index.html: Provides the base HTML shell loading the React application entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app initializes identity, actors, user profile, and startup diagnostics with health checks and timeout logic, then routes to login or authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog component for submitting a resident's ADL record with date, activity, assistance level, and notes via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog for entering daily vital signs for a resident, converting date/time to nanoseconds and submitting via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for recording medication administration for a resident, selecting an active medication and submitting time and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog for adding a new medication to a resident's profile, including dosage, route, schedule, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Complex form dialog for adding a resident with fields for personal info, contacts, medications, and related entities, submitting via useAddResident.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a weight measurement to a resident, validating inputs and submitting via useAddWeightEntry.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with configurable size and fallback text if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Form dialog for editing an existing medication, preloading values and submitting updates via useEditMedication.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Dialog for editing resident details, prepopulating all fields and submitting updates via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial user profile setup form capturing name, role, and employee ID, saved via useSaveCallerUserProfileStartup.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty or placeholder component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen component displaying error details, diagnostics, and retry/logout controls during startup failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles with both standard and startup-safe actor handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a timeout-protected, fault-tolerant backend actor with optional admin initialization, exposing its state via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, dialog overrides, and print-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides utilities for promise timeouts, error pattern detection, and converting backend errors into normalized user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Generates base-path-safe URLs for static assets, normalizing slashes and Vite base URL handling.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to and from nanoseconds, formats dates, and calculates age while avoiding timezone offsets.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Collects backend diagnostic info and performs a public health check to verify backend reachability during startup.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized timeout constants used during application startup flows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main resident management dashboard with filtering, sorting, admin actions, and resident lifecycle operations.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page with Internet Identity authentication and branding UI.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: React page that loads resident data, manages multiple dialogs, and displays profile details with actions for medications, vitals, MAR/ADL records, and printing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, and clear URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending color tokens, container settings, animations, shadows, and theme utilities.
project_state.json: Project state file describing dashboard features, known issues, and pending requests for resident discharge and delete actions.
